mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_GROUP ( USER_NO, GAME_NO, SG_NAME, SG_REGDATE, SG_ENDDATE, SG_CAPA, SG_LEVEL, SG_PLUS, SG_GROUPLIMIT ) VALUES ( #{user_no}, #{game_no}, #{sg_name}, #{sg_regdate}, #{sg_enddate}, 0, #{sg_level}, #{sg_plus}, #{sg_grouplimit} )
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SG_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SG_REGDATE, SG_NO, USER_NO, GAME_NO, SG_NAME, SG_ENDDATE, SG_CAPA, SG_LEVEL, SG_PLUS, SG_GROUPLIMIT FROM STUDY_GROUP
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO HOMEWORK ( USER_NO, HOMEWORK_NAME, HOMEWORK_CONTENT, HOMEWORK_LEVEL, HOMEWORK_DUEDATE, HOMEWORK_REGDATE, HOMEWORK_MODIDATE, SG_NO)
VALUES ( #{user_no}, #{homework_name}, #{homework_content}, #{homework_level}, #{homework_duedate}, #{homework_regdate}, #{homework_modidate}, #{sg_no} );
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GAME_CONTENT GC LEFT JOIN STUDY_GROUP SG ON SG.GAME_NO = GC.GAME_NO WHERE SG_NO = #{sg_no};
